sidebar.coming_soon_desc: This feature will be available soon.
dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.charts.title: CPU & RAM Charts (Last Hour)
dashboard.running_apps.title: Running Applications
dashboard.messages.kill_failed:
Failed to close '{name}'.

Administrator privileges may be required.
startup_status.title: Startup Status
startup_status.description: View and manage apps that start automatically with Windows. Monitor their status and memory usage.
favourite.title: Favourite
favourites.title: Favourite
favourites.description: Manage your favorite apps and browsers. Select items and use 'Run All' to launch them together.
favourites.links.title: Add Link to Browser
favourites.links.multi_select_hint: Select exactly one browser to edit its links.
all_apps.title: All apps
all_apps.description: Discover all installed applications on your system. Click 'Add' to add them to your favorites.
starter_settings.title: Settings
starter_settings.description: Configure automatic launch of selected favorites when Windows starts. Set a delay to control when apps launch.
starter_settings.trigger_selected: Trigger all selected favourites when Windows starts
admin.title: Admin settings
admin.languages.title: Languages
admin.trigger.title: Trigger
admin.trigger.autostart_app: Always start this app when Windows starts
admin.trigger.disabled_tooltip: This feature requires Administrator privileges. Please go to Admin settings → Rules to enable admin mode.
admin.trigger.warning_message: To use the autostart feature, the application needs to run with Administrator privileges. Please go to Admin settings → Rules to enable admin mode.
admin.trigger.need_admin_desc:
This feature requires Administrator privileges.

Please go to Admin settings → Rules and enable 'Allow application to run with Administrator privileges', then try again.
admin.trigger.enabled_message: The app will now start automatically when Windows starts.
admin.trigger.disabled_message: The app will no longer start automatically.
admin.trigger.enable_failed: Failed to enable autostart. Please run the app with Administrator privileges.
admin.trigger.status_enabled:
✓ Autostart is enabled. The app will launch when Windows starts.
Task Name: StarterAppLauncher_AutoStart
admin.rules.title: Rules
admin.rules.run_as_admin: Allow application to run with Administrator privileges
admin.rules.run_as_admin_desc: When enabled, the application will have full system access. This is required to manage system startup apps and terminate processes.
admin.rules.restart_message: The application needs to restart with Administrator privileges. Do you want to continue?
admin.rules.already_admin_message: The application is already running with Administrator privileges. To run in normal mode, close and reopen the application normally.
admin.rules.disabled_admin_message: Administrator requirement disabled. The app will run as normal user next time.
admin.rules.restarting_message: The application will restart with Administrator privileges...
admin.rules.error_message: Failed to restart with Administrator privileges
common.messages.url_invalid: URL must start with http:// or https://
email_registration.title: Register to continue using the application
email_registration.description:
To use the application, you need to enter your email.

Email will be used to:
• Notify you when there are new updates
• Send important information related to the application

We promise not to spam and not to share your email.
email_registration.error_invalid: Please enter a valid email format (e.g., example@email.com)
